ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Any news about Tinkering Patch
ygData.msgSnippet: I only ever heard of tinkering being linked to the poison changes, not the Hole.  The Hole is way overdue, and I m glad it s finally in.  Poison is expected in
ygData.messageBody:
I only ever heard of tinkering being linked to the
poison changes, not the Hole. The Hole is way
overdue, and I'm glad it's finally in. Poison is
expected in the next week, according to their
announced schedule, so I anticipate the tinkering
patch by August or so.

Gazamel Prime
Champion of Ak'Anon, 54 medals
Master Tinker

--- Everque@... wrote:
> Subject says it all. They said that tinkering would
> go in after the Hole and
> poison changes and Hole is in and I saw some mention
> of poison coming soon.
> Anyone know any eta?
>
> Beralt Mindtwister
> 53rd Charmer (Dont like the term Illusionist)
> Master Tinker Prexus
>
